789140.name: The Mind's Eclipse: Art Book and Wallpaper Pack
789140.description:
The CORE, a private research station, 2352. Celebrity scientist Jonathan Campbell awakens to a fallen utopia and must search for his loved ones, with the help of L, a mysterious companion.

This is a digital art book for The Mind's Eclipse, for those who want to get an insight into the creation of the game’s universe. 38 pages long, it features:
  • Developer comments
  • Game lore and backstory
  • Concept art
  • Finished art from The Mind's Eclipse
  • 15 high-resolution wallpapers from the game!
